entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
